mapper.select:
select
from health_steps where user_phone = #{patientPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and to_days(createtime) = to_days(now())

select
from health_steps where user_phone = #{patientPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and ((TO_DAYS(NOW())-TO_DAYS(createtime)) = 1)
mapper.insert: insert into health_steps (id, user_name, user_phone, user_loginid, steps, coins, isget, createtime, updatetime ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userLoginid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{steps,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{coins,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{isget,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updatetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} )
